abstract: Sun Pharma, Indian-based pharmaceutical company who makes drug purchased by Arkansas Department of Correction, announces it does not want product used to administer lethal injections; London-based Hikma Pharmaceuticals and Hospira Inc had previously expressed similar sentiments.
lead_paragraph: An India-based company that appears to have made a drug that Arkansas purchased for lethal injections says it does not want its products used in the state’s plans.

headline.main: Arkansas: Objections Raised Over Use of Drugs in Executions
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Objections Raised Over Use of Drugs in Executions
